articles.title: How Artificial Intelligence Fuels Innovation in Entrepreneurship
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Jotform was launched to solve a problem, leading to its tagline, 'The Easiest Form Builder.' The author focused on usability, constantly improving the product. AI helps to lower the cost of experimentation and removes the friction between idea and execution.

articles.title: Mobiles Under ₹15,000 You've Been Waiting For : Top Deals of the Week
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: iQOO has introduced the Z10 Lite 5G with 4GB RAM, 128GB storage, a 6000 mAh battery, and a 50MP Sony AI camera. Realme is offering the NARZO 80x 5G with 128GB storage, 6GB RAM, and a 50 MP AI Camera. Redmi launched the A4 5G featuring a Snapdragon 4s Gen 2 processor, Android 14, and a 50 MP dual camera. Lava has launched the Storm Play 5G, featuring the MTK D7060 Processor, IP64 Dust and Water Resistance and a 50MP AI camera.

articles.title: Top 4 Moisturizers Under Rs.500 Suitable for Oily Acne-Prone Skin
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Amazon features four moisturizers designed for oily and acne-prone skin: Foxtale Oil Balancing Moisturizer (shine control), Deconstruct Oil-Free Moisturizer (72-hour hydration), Dot & Key Niacinamide + CICA Oil-Free Moisturizer (targets acne marks), and The Derma Co. 5% Nia-Ceramide Mattifying Moisturizer (repairs skin barrier). These moisturizers contain ingredients like niacinamide, cica, and ceramides and are available under Rs.500 during Amazon's Prime Day Sale.

articles.title: AI Agent Era: The IT Service Industry's Survival Competition
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Hyundai Auto Ever introduced an AI-powered test drive reservation function, allowing customers to schedule test drives without direct contact. Samsung SDS plans to integrate AI agents into products like AI platform Fabrics, Britito Pilot, and Briti Automation, with features like 'personal agent' for Briti Copilot and 'Agent Bot' for Briti Automation being rolled out. LG CNS is also collaborating to co-develop customized AI agent services, signaling a broad industry trend towards AI-driven solutions.

articles.title: Cheapest Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Flip 7 deals to pre-order right now
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7, their latest foldable smartphones, at an Unpacked event in New York. The Z Fold 7 features a revamped design, enhanced triple-lens camera with a 200MP primary lens. The Flip 7 includes speedier processors, superior screens, and upgraded cameras.

articles.title: It's Time For Agentic L&D
articles.author: Dan Pontefract
articles.summary: The article introduces "Agentic L&D", a new approach that embeds learning directly into the flow of work, influencing business outcomes rather than just training metrics. EY's GenAI Academy and Microsoft's AI-Era Skilling Transformation initiative exemplify this approach, focusing on contextual learning and embedding skills directly into workflows.

articles.title: 33 Products That Truly Deliver Amazing Results
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff introduced their new "Sqeezy" set, including a versatile cleaning sponge. Anua launched heartleaf pore-clearing cleansing oil for smoother skin, while E.l.f. released Thirst Burst Drops as an alternative to Glow Recipe. Essence introduced Lash Princess mascara for volume and length. A beeswax wood polisher for the furniture care was also launched and a mold and mildew removal gel was introduced.

articles.title: Just 33 Things You'll Use At Least Once A Week All Summer Long
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Hawaiian Tropic launched SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush. L'Oréal Paris introduced BB Cream, a green-tinted formula. E.l.f. released an ultra-affordable color corrector. Hanes now offers Ultimate crew socks. Supergoop has Unseen Sunscreen with SPF 40 or 50. Hanni launched Shave Pillow, a showerless shave gel. Revlon offers a volcanic face roller. Sun Bum released a hair lightener. Essence has a waterproof Lash Princess lengthening mascara. Black Girl Sunscreen introduced Make It Pop Sungloss with SPF 50. Lottabody offers Wrap Me Curl Mousse. Nooni has a tinted appleberry lip oil.

articles.title: Projectors will eventually overtake smart TVs. Here's why
articles.author: Anthony Marcusa
articles.summary: The Magcubic Auto Keystone Mini Portable Projector features a built-in Android 11.0 operating system allowing users to download apps from the Google Play Store. This projector is designed to be portable, can rotate 180°, and includes built-in speakers, offering an alternative to traditional smart TVs.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Fold 7: Is It Time to Upgrade From Your Fold 4?
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a foldable smartphone with upgrades including a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, potential 200MP main camera, brighter and more durable display, and the latest version of One UI. The Z Fold 7 offers faster processing speeds, improved graphics, enhanced AI capabilities and optimized multitasking compared to the Galaxy Z Fold 4.

articles.title: 15 Must-Have Items For Better Child Nap Times
articles.author: Sally Dadisman
articles.summary: The article introduces and describes several products designed to help babies and toddlers sleep, including the Hatch sound machine, Baby Shusher, Guava Lotus Travel Crib, SlumberPod, nap mat, portable sound machine, blackout curtain, sleep sacks, soothing otter, baby earmuffs, sea-life soother, swaddle, Snoo smart bassinet, naptime book and sleep training clock. These products each offer unique features, such as sound options, portability, light-blocking capabilities, and automated rocking, all aimed at improving sleep quality and duration for young children.

articles.title: Google closes free service Amazon and Apple don't offer
articles.author: Daniel Kline
articles.summary: Google will discontinue Google Play Instant starting December 2025, which allowed users to try apps and games without installing them. The decision was made based on developer feedback and investments to improve the ecosystem.

articles.title: 35 Products You'll Use Enough To Put On Autoship
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Gold Bond introduced firming neck and chest cream formulated with aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil. Lottabody launched Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse. Eos launched Marshmallow "Super Balm" lip treatment from the brand's "secret menu". Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder to absorb oil and blur pores. Catrice released "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, now in four shades. Kuumba Made launched Persian Garden fragrance rollerball. Eos introduced Cashmere Skin Collection Shave Oil. E.l.f launched Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara. Monday Haircare launched Dry Shampoo with added keratin. Dr. Melaxin launched "Peel Shot."

articles.title: 28 Things Thirtysomethings Will Want
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff introduced the "Sqeezy" set with a versatile cleaning sponge, enhancing their cleaning paste. Gold Bond launched a neck and chest firming cream with salicylic acid, glycerin, and aloe to improve skin appearance. Levi's released pull-on skinny jeans made with soft, stretchy fabric.

articles.title: ‘Uber for laundry' arrives in NZ
articles.author: The Laundry Lady
articles.summary: The Laundry Lady, an Australian laundry service, has expanded into New Zealand. Clients can book a laundry-washing slot via the website, and a Laundry Lady or Lad picks up, washes, dries, irons, folds, and returns the laundry. This service targets domestic users and small to medium businesses.

articles.title: STC Bank launches new savings product ‘Numu+'
articles.author: Arab News
articles.summary: STC Bank has launched 'Numu+', a new savings product designed to incentivize customers through rewards like luxury cars and electronic devices. The 'Numu+' account, accessible via the bank's app, aligns with Vision 2030 and aims to increase savings rates. This product also includes features like instant local and international transfers, card services, and financial planning.

articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7 to debut with One UI 8: Top AI features to look out for
articles.author: Husain Rizvi
articles.summary: Samsung has unveiled its Galaxy Z Fold 7, equipped with the new One UI 8 launching on July 25. The Galaxy Z Fold7 features Samsung's largest and most refined folding display and introduces a 200MP wide-angle rear camera. It is available for pre-order in the UAE starting from Dh7,599.

articles.title: 26 Hair Items That Are Complete And Total Game Changers
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: L'Oreal introduced a Paris rinse-out lamellar water treatment for quick hair care. Revlon offers a one-step hair dryer and volumizer. Dae provides a Cactus Fruit 3-In-1 Styling Cream for hair styling. Bio Ionic launched a Long Barrel Curling Iron featuring NanoIonic MX technology.

articles.title: The High-Tech Way Some Conveyor Belt Sushi Places Make Sure Their Revolving Fish Is Fresh
articles.author: Willow Roberts
articles.summary: Kura Sushi introduced Mr. Fresh (Sendo-kun) in 2011, a hands-free sushi cover with antibacterial standards, designed to keep sushi fresh and protected. They also implemented an AI camera system to monitor the plates on the conveyor belt, ensuring optimal amounts and mix of sushi availability, enhancing overall food safety and quality.

articles.title: South Africa's Government Online Shop: A Test of the 'Alibaba' Concept
articles.author: Senior Editor
articles.summary: South Africa is launching a new government-backed e-commerce platform to bolster local businesses. This initiative aims to compete with international giants like Alibaba by creating a centralized online hub for South African products and offering a streamlined experience for both buyers and sellers. The platform intends to foster economic growth and provide local entrepreneurs with greater access to markets.

articles.title: 5 things trendy Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 can do that other phones cant
articles.author: Vanguard
articles.summary: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 is a new smartphone with a futuristic design and cutting-edge features. It aims to differentiate itself from other smartphones in the market.

articles.title: Ranking The 5 Cheapest Trucks In America
articles.author: Karl Furlong
articles.summary: Nissan Frontier starts at $32k with a 3.8-liter V6 engine. Chevrolet Colorado features a 2.7-liter four-cylinder turbocharged engine. Hyundai Santa Cruz SE has a 2.5-liter four-cylinder engine. Ford Maverick XL has a hybrid powertrain and is the cheapest new truck on sale.

articles.title: Foldables Are Gaining Popularity and Becoming Ultra Slim
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7, with updates to the cover display. The Galaxy Watch 8 features a rounded square design for a thinner profile. Nothing is releasing the Phone 3, touted as its first flagship, and the Headphone 1. Perplexity introduced Comet browser which uses Perplexity as its main search engine. Anker is launching new Nano Wireless Car Charger.

articles.title: Coca-Cola brings back controversial Coke flavor
articles.author: Daniel Kline
articles.summary: Coca-Cola introduced "Coca-Cola Creations," a global innovation platform that launched new products like Coca-Cola Starlight, a soda with a reddish hue and flavors reminiscent of stargazing. Coca-Cola Starlight is set to return later in the year with updated packaging, offering fans a chance to enjoy the space-inspired flavor again.

articles.title: Coca-Cola brings back controversial Coke flavor
articles.author: Daniel Kline
articles.summary: Coca-Cola introduced "Coca-Cola Creations," a global innovation platform. This platform is designed to create new flavors, expanding Coca-Cola's product line.

articles.title: I tried a new Galaxy phone, and it's Samsung's most exciting device in years
articles.author: David Snelling
articles.summary: Samsung has released the new Galaxy Z Fold7 with a slimmer design due to new Armour FlexHinge technology. The Z Fold7 features a larger 6.5-inch cover screen, an 8-inch main panel, a Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy chip, and a 200MP main lens camera. The starting price for this model is £1,799.

articles.title: Elon Musk Accidentally Unleashes MechaHitler
articles.author: Jeffrey Blehar
articles.summary: Elon Musk introduced 'Grok,' an AI bot designed to compete with ChatGPT and other similar AI services. The launch positions 'Grok' as a new entrant in the artificial intelligence market.

articles.title: Foldables are in and suddenly really thin
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: Samsung is launching new foldable phones. The article also discusses apps such as Pixel Pals, Digg, Live Soccer TV, Crouton, Nova and Mimestream, Folio, Marvel Snap and A Solitaire Mystery.

articles.title: Trader Joe's Jumps on Two Big Food Trends with this Protein Packed Find
articles.author: Cristine Struble
articles.summary: Trader Joe's has introduced a new product, Skipjack Tuna Fillets, priced under $4. This Mediterranean tuna is sustainably caught, packed in olive oil, seasoned with salt, and cooked. Its mild flavor and versatile nature make it a protein-rich meal option suitable for various dishes.

articles.title: 5 things trendy Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 can do that other phones can't
articles.author: efosataiwo@vanguardngr.com
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a smartphone featuring a foldable display that transforms into a 7.6-inch mini tablet. The device allows users to run three apps simultaneously and offers seamless app continuity between screens. Additionally, the Galaxy Z Fold 7 includes Flex Mode for hands-free interaction and can be used as a portable workstation with Samsung DeX.

articles.title: Egyptian Startup Tackles Fake Cash-on-Delivery Orders with New Shopify App
articles.author: Egyptian Streets
articles.summary: Xtnd, a Cairo-based startup, has launched its new product, the OTP-COD Order Verification app, designed for Shopify stores in Egypt. The app helps online stores verify COD orders by sending OTPs via SMS or confirmation links via email to reduce fraudulent orders. It integrates directly with Shopify and offers a free trial with SMS and email credits.

articles.title: These 5 Nigerian Lipstick Brands Belong in Every Girl's Makeup Bag
articles.summary: Nuban Beauty offers richly pigmented, cruelty-free matte lipsticks designed for African skin tones. Zaron Cosmetics provides affordable, hydrating lipsticks for everyday wear, with a wide range of colors. Yanga Beauty features bold liquid lipsticks with a matte finish in statement-making shades.

articles.title: 31 Little Upgrades To Your Day-To-Day That Won't Sound Life-Changing…Until You Try Them
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Monday Haircare launched Dry Shampoo with a gardenia scent and keratin treatment. Rael introduced "Miracle Invisible Spot Cover" Pimple Patches featuring a hydrocolloid formula. Touchland released Power Mist hydrating hand sanitizer with an aloe vera-infused formula and a flora scent.

articles.title: 40 Genius Products To Add To Your Cart
articles.author: Amanda Davis
articles.summary: Brumate launched Era 40-ounce water bottle which is leak-proof with a metal straw inside and a silicone straw on top that locks in place to prevent spills. Alleyoop launched 4-in-1 makeup brush that features an eyeshadow brush, a blush brush, a brow brush, and a blending sponge. RobeCurls launched a heatless hair curler made with satin that helps prevent tangled hair.

articles.title: All the middle of Lidl bargains in stores this weekend – including double clothes line and cordless vacuum cleaner
articles.author: Aiya Zhussupova
articles.summary: Lidl is launching new middle aisle deals this weekend, including the Beldray 26m Retractable Double Clothes Line for £9.99, the Silvercrest Cordless Cyclone Handheld Vacuum Cleaner for £69.99, and an Air Fryer with grill and smoker for £99.99. Other products include the Rocktrail Beer Cool Bag for £9.99 and the Scrub Daddy Scrub Mommy Sponge for £2.99. Lidl Plus subscribers can get the Beldray clothes line for 33 percent off.

articles.title: Fujifilm X-M5 review: The camera that made me feel something again
articles.summary: Fujifilm has launched the X-M5 camera, a compact and lightweight camera with a 26.1-megapixel sensor and X-processor 5. The X-M5 supports 6.2K open-gate 10-bit internal recording and includes a film simulation dial with 20 different color profiles. It is priced at Rs 87,999 for the full set and Rs 77,999 for the body alone.

articles.title: 43 Beauty Products That Actually Work
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Aquaphor introduces a Lip Repair tube with shea butter and chamomile essence. La Roche-Posay launches a triple repair moisturizer suitable for all ages. Hawaiian Tropic unveils an SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush. Gold Bond releases a skin-firming neck and chest cream with hyaluronic acid. Nivea launches a skin firming gel cream packed with Q10. Burt's Bees introduces After Sun Soother lotion with aloe and coconut oil. Monday Haircare launches Dry Shampoo with keratin and gardenia scent. I Dew Care introduces 'Tap Secret' mattifying powder shampoo. Neutrogena launches Hydro Boost Body Moisturizing Gel Cream. Vanilla Velvet Touchland unveils Power Essence Hydrating Body and Hair Fragrance. Bounce Curl releases Define EdgeLift Brush for curly or wavy hair. Eos launches 24H Moisture Super Balm in marshmallow fluff flavor. Good Molecules launches Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel. Abib launches Airy Sunstick Smoothing Bar featuring a curved design. Lottabody's launches Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse is designed for all hair types. Catrice's launches "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. E.l.f's launches Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara features a lightweight tubing technology. Elizavecca launches Collagen Protein Treatment. Ouai launches Wave Spray. Medicube launches Deep Vitamin C Golden Capsule Face Moisturizer. Anua launches heartleaf pore-clearing cleansing oil. Laneige launches Neo Blurring Powder. L'Oréal Paris launches BB Cream. Essence launches Drop of Sunshine Bronzing Drops. Rhode launches Pocket Blush. Olive & June's launches seven-free nail polish mani system. Mise En Scene launches Perfect Serum. Jergens launches Natural Glow Firming Self Tanner Body Lotion. Kojic Acid launches Dark Spot Remover Soap. Medix launches retinol body lotion. Sol de Janeiro launches Brazilian Bum Bum Cream and Body Badalada Lotion. E.l.f.'s launches Holy Hydration! Thirst Burst Drops. Olay launches Super Serum Body Wash. Nooni launches appleberry lip oil. Lip Smacker launches Rolly Lip Gloss. Good Molecules launches Lightweight Daily Moisturizer. Tarte launches Big Stick Energy duo.

articles.title: We spent $145 at Red Lobster on a meal for 2 to see if its viral new seafood boils live up to the hype
articles.summary: Red Lobster launched new seafood boils in June, including the Mariner's Boil for $54.99 with lobster tail, shrimp, and crab legs, and the Sailor's Boil for $39.99 with shrimp and sausage. Customers can customize the boils with flavors and spice levels, and the company is highlighting the product during its Crabfest event.

articles.title: Walmart is selling a 'lightweight' $349 laptop for $170, and shoppers say it 'works great'
articles.author: Jon Winkler
articles.summary: Walmart is selling the Rnruo Windows 11 Laptop. This laptop is being offered at a wallet-friendly price.

articles.title: Cardi B, an American hip-hop icon and global star, shared a review of the K-beauty brand "Ha Ye-jin"..
articles.author: Kim Hyo-Hye
articles.summary: Cardi B is introducing Ha Ye-jin's Rice Fila™ oil toner and moisturizing cream via her social media channels. Her review of the K-beauty product led to a surge in popularity and sell-out status in overseas online malls.

articles.title: Gauzy Unveils Automotive Industry's First Prefabricated Smart Glass Stack
articles.author: Maham Fatima
articles.summary: Gauzy Ltd. launched the automotive industry's first prefabricated smart glass stack on July 1st. This turnkey solution integrates dimmable smart glass films, conductive elements, and adhesive interlayers, aiming to maximize manufacturing efficiency and smart glass adoption in the automotive sector. Gauzy's expansion is further supported by a collaboration with Hotlineglass-USA.

articles.title: Gauzy Unveils Automotive Industry's First Prefabricated Smart Glass Stack
articles.author: Maham Fatima
articles.summary: Gauzy Ltd. unveiled the automotive industry's first prefabricated smart glass stack on July 1. This turnkey solution integrates dimmable smart glass films, conductive elements, and adhesive interlayers into a single unit and is designed to maximize manufacturing efficiency and adoption of smart glass in the automotive sector.

articles.title: Pay to view apartments trend in Spain?
articles.author: Marc Menendez-Roche
articles.summary: Rently, a Silicon Valley startup, has introduced a pay-to-view model for apartment rentals, charging prospective tenants a fee to view properties. The service offers various plans, including a casual viewing plan and a 'Verified Renter Status' option with additional perks. The potential adoption of this model in Spain is being considered, given the rental market conditions there.

articles.title: McDonald's big announcement launches bold new twist on breakfast classic
articles.summary: McDonald's is introducing Spicy McMuffins for a limited time at select locations starting July 8. The company has also recently added the Daily Double burger to its national menu and is bringing back the Snack Wrap with Spicy or Ranch sauce options starting July 10.

articles.title: The anti-doomscroll phone that wants to mix it up with Apple
articles.author: Tim Biggs
articles.summary: Nothing is launching Headphone 1, noise-cancelling headphones with high-res audio support and custom drivers by KEF, priced at $550. Alongside, Nothing is introducing Essential Search on Phone 3, which provides information from files and apps and answers web questions.  Future experimental product categories and updated versions of Phone 3 are planned.

articles.title: 'Gorgeous' Debenhams maxi dress 'better than the pictures' is 25% off
articles.author: Lee Garrett
articles.summary: Debenhams is offering the FS Collection Hem Detail Tiered Maxi Dress at a discounted price of £40.50. M&S is selling the Linen Rich V-Neck Mini Shift Dress for £32.50. New Look features the Black Gingham Shirred Midi Dress priced at £35.99.

articles.title: Hyundai Debuts 640 HP IONIQ 6 N at Goodwood Festival of Speed
articles.summary: Hyundai is launching the IONIQ 6 N, a 640 HP electric vehicle, on July 10th. The IONIQ 6 N features reengineered suspension, a new battery management system, and aerodynamic enhancements. It also includes new personalization options and performance parts.

articles.title: Best Robot Vacuum: $129 Deal – News.com.au 🤖✨
articles.author: Senior Editor
articles.summary: Roborock and Dreame robot vacuums are becoming mainstream due to advancements in navigation, suction power, and battery life, as demonstrated by their prominence during Amazon Prime Day.  Future models will integrate AI for object recognition, smart home ecosystems for intuitive control, and specialized cleaning capabilities, raising data privacy considerations.

articles.title: Ai+ Nova 5G Sale Begins on Today in India; Form Specifications to Features and Price, Here's Everything To Know About New AI+ Budget Smartphone
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: NxtQuantum Shift Technologies launched the Ai+ Nova 5G smartphone in India, which went on sale today and sold out on Flipkart. The phone features a 50MP rear and front camera, a 6.7-inch HD+ display with a 120Hz refresh rate, and is powered by a UniSoC T8200 processor. The Ai+ Nova 5G is available in two variants, 6GB+128GB at INR 7,999 and 8GB+128GB at INR 9,999.

articles.title: From Dragons' Den 'pasta le disaster' to £40m success where 'future is the US'
articles.author: Rod Gilmour
articles.summary: Pasta Evangelists opened its first fresh pasta factory in North Acton in 2023 and also runs the UK's biggest fresh pasta cookery school. The company delivers in 50 UK towns and cities and harbours ambition to bring its restaurant arm to 15 locations by the end of 2025. The company is planning to expand to the USA.

articles.title: Firm awards N48m to hygiene startups
articles.author: Our Reporter
articles.summary: Reckitt awarded N48 million in seed funding to four social enterprises: Geotek, HealthTracka, MN Environmental Services, and Preggify, through the Reckitt Access Accelerator Programme. Each enterprise received N12 million to scale their health and hygiene solutions, including access to clean water, at-home health tests, public toilet facilities, and maternal care. The Access Accelerator programme will merge under the recently launched Reckitt Catalyst, an initiative to accelerate social impact projects.

articles.title: Next's new £30 kaftan dress is 'nice and loose' and 'comfy in hot weather'
articles.author: Matt LLoyd
articles.summary: Next offers the 'Kaftan Mini Dress with Linen' in four colors and patterns, designed for hot weather with a breezy fabric mix including linen. Customers praise its comfort, quality, and versatility, noting its suitability for both day-to-night wear and as a beach cover-up. Marks and Spencer also offers a similar product.

articles.title: Samsung's bet on the future of smartphones is something Apple doesn't have an answer to yet
articles.author: Lisa Eadicicco
articles.summary: Samsung announced the launch of three new foldable phones: the Galaxy Z Fold 7 ($2,000), Galaxy Z Flip 7 ($1,100), and Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE ($900). These new phones will be available starting July 25, with preorders opening on July 9.

articles.title: ‘Multimodal AI to free users from hassle of typing'
articles.author: Nam Hyun-Woo
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Flip 7 smartphones, featuring multimodal AI that allows users to interact via voice and camera input. This AI provides real-time suggestions and understands user intent, demonstrated with features like outfit recommendations based on visual input and context.

articles.title: Android's Secret Weapon: Unlocking Powerful New Settings Features
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Android is introducing a new 'System Services' section within the Settings app, providing users with a centralized location to manage and update crucial Google services. Google Maps enhances its offline capabilities allowing users to download map areas. Also improvements to the Digital Wellbeing suite, advanced sound and vibration controls, and enhanced security features are introduced in Android devices.

articles.title: Augusta's Online Farmers Market Now Open
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Augusta Locally Grown launched an online market to provide year-round access to fresh produce, addressing food access challenges in specific regions. The market operates from Friday to Sunday, with order pickups on Tuesdays. A new pickup spot will open at the Dearing town hall, and they are planning to revive their North Augusta location and expand to Grovetown and potentially Hephzibah.

articles.title: New Jaguar car that lead disastrous ‘woke rebrand' seen for the first time… with fans divided over whether they like it
articles.author: Harry Torrance
articles.summary: Jaguar unveiled its new Type 00 concept car at the Goodwood Festival of Speed, showcasing the company's new "exuberant modernism". The car's design and color are departures from previous Jaguar designs, sparking debate among fans regarding Jaguar's new direction and rebrand.

articles.title: Oodie's cooling blankets in range of new colours and prints hailed a 'lifesaver' during the heatwave
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: A new cooling blanket features a soft and cool-to-the-touch material, highlighting its innovative design for temperature regulation and comfort.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE 5G mobile launch: Price, specs and what to expect
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch its new generation Fan Edition smartphone, the Galaxy S25 FE, in India in the coming months. The smartphone has already started to appear in the rumour mill. Leaks suggest potential design, specifications, and features of the Galaxy S25 FE.

articles.title: The Editor-Tested Nuna Travel System Is 25% Off During The Nordstrom Anniversary Sale
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Nuna Mixx Next stroller is being offered at a 25% discount during the Nordstrom Anniversary Sale. This deal makes the high-end stroller system more accessible to customers.

articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7 to debut with One UI 8: Top AI features to ...
articles.author: Khaleejtimes
articles.summary: Samsung has unveiled the Galaxy Z Fold 7 featuring refined hardware and a 7.6-inch display. The device will launch with One UI 8, which has Android 16 pre-installed, starting July 25.

articles.title: The Poco F7 poses a real problem for the OnePlus Nord 5 and Nothing Phone 3
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Poco is positioned to introduce Poco F7. Poco F7 is offering a price/performance balance.

articles.title: Doha Bank launches API product for seamless corporate banking
articles.author: Gulf-Times
articles.summary: Doha Bank introduced its new API banking product for corporate clients. This product aims to streamline and enhance their banking experience. Doha Bank is among the first in Qatar to launch open banking services for transactional and reconciliation services.

articles.title: SleekFlow Unveils AgentFlow: Building Teams of AI Agents To Increase Revenue For Businesses
articles.summary: SleekFlow, an Agentic AI platform, is launching AgentFlow. AgentFlow is a transformative AI solution designed to build teams.
